description:
`<>` indicates a required argument
`[]` indicates the argument is optional
`...` it indicates multiple of the same type of argument
You do not include these characters in the command.
⠀

fields.name: **Set your server's default event invite link**
fields.value:
`@JirosCal#7363 link <invite_link>`
`@JirosCal#7363 link`
link should never expire
⠀

fields.name: **Specify where events from followed servers get displayed**
**Follow other servers' events**
fields.value:
`@JirosCal#7363 [un]follow <all/server_name>`
`@JirosCal#7363 following`
can be used in dm's as well
⠀

fields.name: **Whitelist other hosts**
fields.value:
`@JirosCal#7363 whitelist @user`
must be a whitelisted host to use this command
⠀

footer.text: Contact Mo#9991 regarding suggestions or issues.

title: Command List
